comment: I took him for the summer and despite how quickly the topics would go, he made understanding them really easy. There was extra credit offered every class in a group setting and there were learning assistants who helped us prep for every test. 10/10!
Amazing teacher made 3 hour precal fun

I took the MATH 1113 SUM 2024 Pre-Cal course and he was amazing! He always had a smile, was very helpful, didn't mind re-explaining course material if a student didn't understand, happily answered questions, adapted to different teaching styles while teaching the course material, reopened assignments, and planned a study session before each test.
Peddles his book on social justice issues. Not difficult, but agree should be an online class.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lecture heavy--Graded by few things

comment: This should be an online course. The day/time commitment was not needed for the quality of instruction. Dr. Lawler wasn't the worst MAED professor, but far from the best.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Lecture heavy--Graded by few things
